Package icap

Overall ICAP package.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ConnectionsPool PoolThreads class allow to manage a thread pool for client connections.
IcapServer Main application class, launch ICAP servers.
Parse configuration file, configure and instantiate the requested services.
Each service is run with its own port and server socket.
IcapServerDaemon A basic attempt to wrap GreasySpoon with Apache commons-daemon
 

Package icap Description

Overall ICAP package. Multi-services implementation of ICAP server. Supports dynamic instantiation of ICAP services.
